EnumProperty.Name: Keyword
EnumProperty.Description: Version of the format of this Qt Visual Studio project.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: QtInstall
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Select Qt installation; can be either a path to an installation directory or a version name registered through the Qt Visual Studio Tools (v2.4 or above).

BoolProperty.Name: QtPlugin
BoolProperty.Description: Select whether this project is used to generate a Qt plugin.

EnumProperty.Name: QtBuildConfig
EnumProperty.Description: Select whether to use debug or release.

EnumProperty.Name: QtToolsDesignTime
EnumProperty.Description: Run Qt tools during IntelliSense builds.

StringProperty.Name: QtPathBinaries
StringProperty.Description: Path to folder containing executables of Qt tools (qmake, moc, etc.) When a non-rooted path is specified, it will be considered relative to the Qt installation directory.

StringProperty.Name: QtPathLibraryExecutables
StringProperty.Description: Path to folder containing executable files of Qt modules. When a non-rooted path is specified, it will be considered relative to the Qt installation directory.

EnumProperty.Name: QtQMakeTemplate
EnumProperty.Description: Template of generated project files for extraction of Qt build settings.

BoolProperty.Name: QtQMLDebugEnable
BoolProperty.Description: Select whether to launch a QML session when debugging.

StringProperty.Name: Qt_CL_OPTIONS_
StringProperty.Description: Additional compiler options required by Qt. These options will be passed to the compiler, unless specifically excluded in the next field.

StringProperty.Name: QtExcludedOptions
StringProperty.Description: Options to exclude from the above compiler options required by Qt. These options will NOT be passed to the compiler. Prefix options with '/' or '-', and separate them with spaces.

BoolProperty.Name: QtOptionsBuildLog
BoolProperty.Description: Print to the build log the list of additional options passed to the compiler.

EnumProperty.Name: QtLinkNatvisFile
EnumProperty.Description: Embeds the debugger visualizations (.natvis file) into the PDB file generated by LINK. While setting this option, the embedded Natvis file will take precedence over user-specific Natvis files (for example the files located in %USERPROFILE%\\Documents\\Visual Studio 2022\\Visualizers).
